pages.text: The so-called Carrot Jewels are jewels that are specially carved in the shape of a carrot. These jewels are favored by the Three Goddesses. $(p) Carrot Jewels are mainly offered to the Triple Goddess, but can also be used to synthesize important blocks such as Umamusume Pedestals. It is a wasteful way to offer them directly to the Three Goddesses, and it is now common practice to use them to synthesize "Uma Tickets".
Some villagers also trade with each other using Carrot Jewels, which is the second most useful use of Carrot Jewels.
